Articles.Content: hi all , just got this awesome game that my son seen on good game spawn point and he asked me to get it for him , it totally rocks he and I had such fun building and blowing up our rockets although on a few attemps almost made orbit , my son and I luv it .

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

Welcome to the KSP Family. May you have many long and (mostly) successful journeys.

And remember, time spent wasted is not time wasted
welkom to the KSP, happy flying and remember in space no one can hear you laugh ;P

If you saw it on Good Game, you have a reasonable chance of being a fellow Australian.

In which case, G'day (throws over a can of the coldie of your choice)!
thanks everybody , cant believe time flies by when your consistantly blowing up , its so cool , finally a game that is real fun and not fustrating glad to be part of the kerbal family
